item.description:
Discover why CHAGA is the "single most powerful healing herb in the world" -David Wolfe


Chaga is a bark like mushroom that grows right here in the Northeast region on living trees. It is an herbal adaptogen, cancer fighter, immune fighter, longevity tonic and much more. Reishi is the Queen of Mushrooms with an equally long list of health benefits.

Come learn about these mushrooms, their amazing healing properties and how to forage for them with Master Forager Steve Restmeyer. This course will focus exclusively on the polypores and chaga. You will have an opportunity to purchase these mushrooms after the class. Beverage samples will be shared including a demo of Imani's Mamalicious Superfood Brew!


Steven Restmeyer has studied herbal plant medicines for over 30 years. Learn how to identify and cook with medicinal mushrooms.For the last 20 years he has focused on medicinal mushrooms and their ability to help maintain a body free of cancer and viral infections.Â You can reach Steve at Amazonmedicines@gmail.com
item.name: CHAGA! King of Medicinal Mushrooms
